instruction: Remove the adundant whitespaces and canonicalize the letter cases by capitalizing the first letter of each words and leave other letters as lower case.

minimal: `MOUSE_DOWN` the first cell of the cells containing the text you want to clean.
`DRAG_TO` the last cell of the cells containing the text you want to clean.
`TYPE` '=PROPER(TRIM(A1))' in an empty cell (replace A1 with the first cell in your selection).
`MOUSE_DOWN` the fill handle (the small square at the bottom-right of the cell).
`DRAG_TO`   down to apply the formula to the rest of the cells.
batched: `MOUSE_DOWN` the first cell of the cells containing the text you want to clean.
`DRAG_TO` the last cell of the cells containing the text you want to clean.
`TYPE` '=PROPER(TRIM(A1))' in an empty cell (replace A1 with the first cell in your selection).
`MOUSE_DOWN` the fill handle (the small square at the bottom-right of the cell).
`DRAG_TO`   down to apply the formula to the rest of the cells.
